analysis: The project is a website about black holes with a cosmic theme. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a test website. The CSS file needs to be completed with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file needs to be updated with a mobile-friendly navigation menu and proper event handlers for buttons. The JavaScript file needs to be fixed for syntax errors and completed with functionality for the mobile menu toggle and button interactions.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
